tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had horrible tooth ache because of infection. It was 7 pm and the doctor 's shop was closed. With anguish, I called them & explained my condition. Dr. Mudit immediately responded, told me that he would open the shop for my sake. When I rushed there, he treated me with care & concern. Later I learnt that his 6 year old child was running 106°temparature . They were getting her tested for dengue.
I have no words to thank him. 

** *** **** ****** ******* ** ***** *********** *** ***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Hygiene atmosphere. Responsive people, **** ******** best facilities, personalized treatment, highest care while providing treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Excellent team of doctors. Patient and friendly staff.  The treatment process was so smooth and very comfortable. Highly recommend Dr. Mudit , Dr. Swati  and Dr. Manisha for any kind of dental treatments. Extremely satisfied
It was a great experience with the doctor and cleanse my teeth properly . The staff treated well and good manner.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
In the beginning I was reluctant, but Fr. Swati made it very comfortable for me. She explained to me what and how my dental looks like and what treatment I can go ahead with. I was very contented with het treatment. 
Dr. Mudit handled very smoothly the filling of my tooth. I am very contented with the treatment. Would highly recomend both the doctors for any Dental issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I would highly recommend Dr. Mudit for dental treatment. He is excellent at creating a comfortable environment, ensuring a painless procedure. Throughout the process, he consistently communicated what he was doing, prioritizing my comfort and minimizing any discomfort or pain.

tags: Wait time,
review: It is really pathetic to write this review! I have visited their clinic for check up today morning at 11am, where i had to wait for 1 hour to get addressed by someone just to check  and tell me to come in the evening. Okay! This time i have taken an appointment at 6:45pm and reached to the clinic on time. My luck is bad this time also i had to wait for half an hour and no one addressed. I don't understand the cause of taking appointment when it is not maintained by these so called professionals. I would recommend if someone is visiting this clinic for the first time make your mind to patiently wait for 1hr to he addressed by someone in the clinic
reply_text:
Hello Chaitanya, we are sorry that you had to wait for your appointment. However we always strive to deliver the best. As you mentioned in the morning when you had visited you did not have an appointment. We had already informed that it would take time and we accommodated you in between patients for a check-up. In the evening when you visited, there was another root canal treatment going on for the patient prior to you. Being a medical procedure we cannot rush with treatments and sometimes it is difficult to anticipate the exact time required. You had to wait half an hour for your appointment, which as per me is not something that you should be disappointed about as even if you were on the chair for the treatment, we would not have hurried up with the procedure as per the requirement. We tried to reach you again later and Dr. Swati had called you personally. 
We really do not appreciate this impatience in a healthcare facility. 
Regards,
Dr. Mudit Kedia.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
This was my 2nd visit to Teethling Dental.
Am highly satisfied with the overall experience there.  Dr. Mudit has equipped the clinic with state of the art technologies like 3D imaging, etc. which gives one a very comforting assurance that we are in good hands.  
Also the team of doctors that work along with him are superb. 
Dr. Tasneem did my wisdom tooth extraction. The whole procedure was very smooth and absolutely painless. She kept the environment extremely calm and comforting ensuring zero stress during the process. 
I highly recommend Teethling Dental for all dental procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Dental Deep Cleaning,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Surgery,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: *** ***** ** * **** **** ******* ** ***** ** the way he understands the patients issues, pain and provides the right resolution and treatment. He ensures patient comfort is top priority and has all the good technology to address the needs of the treatment. I've undergone various treatments with him and his surgeon Dr. Suhas, and it has always been a comforting and satisfactory experience. Dr. Swati is also a very good dentist for children. I would highly recommend visiting Teethling for any issues related to your teeth, no matter which part of bangalore you are based out of!

review: *** ***** ***** ** ** ****** ***** **** **********, he has an excellent hand, clean, he explains step by step what he will do, I felt at my best from the beginning, I am Italian and I work around the world, most of the time I prefer wait until I come home to see the dentist, here instead I see a very good standard, and I can guarantee that DR.Mudit Kedia is a very high standard, I will have to stay in Bengaluru for a few years and from the first appointment the I told DR.  Mudit Kedia who will be my dentist.  If you don't want bad surprises, make sure you go to a good one, I recommend Mudit Kedia, Dental care clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the most friendly and professional doctors I've ever visited. They took ample amount of time to first indentify and analyse the problem completely then informed me about every cost that is involved from starting till the end. After this, the treatments went on smoothly. The root canals were absolutely painless and between watching Netflix and other things I couldn't even realize that the process was finished already. Huge thanks to Dr Swathi as well who used to call and check up on my recovery periodically. Lastly, thanks to the assistants who were so friendly and were always there for any queries or support I needed. I Will recommend Dr Mudit and Dr Swati to everyone, they will always be my go-to dentists in Bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Mudit Kedia provided thorough explanations of necessary fillings and procedures during my initial checkup, accompanied by insightful insights from X-rays. Neglecting dental hygiene in my teenage years led to cavities, but Mudit's meticulous and measured approach to the filling procedures. He ensured a pain-free experience. His expertise and care left me with no complications post procedure. Excellent service.

reply_text:
Hello, 
The amount mentioned by you was for all the treatments which was required as per the check-up done and not just the root canal treatment.

We are glad to help you for any further clarifications.

Regards,
Dr. Mudit Kedia.
